com.strongloop.android.remoting

Class VirtualObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strongloop.android.remoting.VirtualObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Container, File, Model

    public class VirtualObject
extends java.lang.Object
    A local representative of a single virtual object. The behavior of this object is defined through a model defined on the server, and the identity of this instance is defined through its `creationParameters`.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualObject()
      Creates a new object not attached to any repository.
      VirtualObject(Repository repository, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> creationParameters)
      Creates a new object from the given repository and parameters.

      • invokeMethod

        public void invokeMethod(java.lang.String method,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> parameters,
                Adapter.Callback callback)
        Invokes a remotable method exposed within instances of this class on the server.
        Parameters:
        method - The method to invoke (without the repository), e.g. "doSomething".
        parameters - The parameters to invoke with.
        callback - The callback to invoke when the execution finishes.

      • invokeMethod

        public void invokeMethod(java.lang.String method,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> parameters,
                Adapter.BinaryCallback callback)
        Invokes a remotable method exposed within instances of this class on the server, parses the response as binary data.
        Parameters:
        method - The method to invoke (without the repository), e.g. "doSomething".
        parameters - The parameters to invoke with.
        callback - The callback to invoke when the execution finishes.
